name: m2c2kit
description: A library for cross-platform cognitive assessments

scripts.build: concurrently "npm run build -w @m2c2kit/core" "npm run build -w @m2c2kit/cli" "npm run build -w @m2c2kit/schematics" "npm run build -w @m2c2kit/build-helpers" "npm run build -w @m2c2kit/schema-util" && concurrently "npm run build -w @m2c2kit/addons" "npm run build -w @m2c2kit/physics" "npm run build -w @m2c2kit/survey" "npm run build -w @m2c2kit/embedding" "npm run build -w @m2c2kit/schematics" "npm run build -w @m2c2kit/sage-research" "npm run build -w @m2c2kit/db" && concurrently "npm run build -w @m2c2kit/assessment-grid-memory" "npm run build -w @m2c2kit/assessment-symbol-search" "npm run build -w @m2c2kit/assessment-color-dots" "npm run build -w @m2c2kit/assessment-color-shapes" "npm run build -w @m2c2kit/assessment-cli-starter" && concurrently "npm run build-webview -w @m2c2kit/assessments-demo" && concurrently "npm run build -w @m2c2kit/assessments-demo" "npm run copy-no-js-bundler-assets"
scripts.integration-test: docker-compose down && docker-compose build --no-cache && docker-compose up --exit-code-from m2c2kit
scripts.copy-no-js-bundler-assets: cpy --flat packages/core/build-nobundler/*.[jt]s examples/no-js-bundler-development/lib/ && cpy --flat packages/addons/build-nobundler/*.[jt]s examples/no-js-bundler-development/lib/ && cpy --flat packages/survey/build-nobundler/*.[jt]s examples/no-js-bundler-development/lib/ && cpy --flat packages/embedding/build-nobundler/*.[jt]s examples/no-js-bundler-development/lib/ && cpy . ../../../examples/no-js-bundler-development/assets --cwd=packages/core/assets && cpy --flat packages/assessment-symbol-search/assets/fonts/roboto/Roboto-Regular.ttf examples/no-js-bundler-development/assets/no-bundler-example/fonts/roboto && cpy --flat packages/core/index.html examples/no-js-bundler-development && npx cpy . ../../../examples/no-js-bundler-development/assets/symbol-search --cwd=packages/assessment-symbol-search/assets && cpy --flat packages/assessment-symbol-search/build-nobundler/*.[jt]s examples/no-js-bundler-development/lib/ && npx cpy . ../../../examples/no-js-bundler-development/assets/color-dots --cwd=packages/assessment-color-dots/assets && cpy --flat packages/assessment-color-dots/build-nobundler/*.[jt]s examples/no-js-bundler-development/lib/ && npx cpy . ../../../examples/no-js-bundler-development/assets/color-shapes --cwd=packages/assessment-color-shapes/assets && cpy --flat packages/assessment-color-shapes/build-nobundler/*.[jt]s examples/no-js-bundler-development/lib/ && npx cpy . ../../../examples/no-js-bundler-development/assets/grid-memory --cwd=packages/assessment-grid-memory/assets && cpy --flat packages/assessment-grid-memory/build-nobundler/*.[jt]s examples/no-js-bundler-development/lib/
